title: Please Kill Me (Part 1)
body:
Please Kill Me (Part 1)

(Your title ??? Is reacting)

(Your title ??? Is reacting)

(Your title ??? Is reacting)

These notifications kept appearing and disappearing at lightning speed on Evan's status window.

Unlike normal notifications which never disappear, these notifications immediately disappeared from his status window after flashing on it for a brief second.

They were so fast that Evan wasn't even aware of them.

As notifications flashed on his status window, Evan felt the anger he was feeling begin to disappear, and his heavy and rapid breathing returned to normal.

Evan's eyes, which were full of anger a moment ago, started to turn cold and there was no emotion visible in them except coldness.

The people who were present in the guild building looked in Evan's direction with uncertainty.
